patterns_discovered: Cascading validation through multiple nested structures
Detailed error tracking with field and message specificity
Validation of complex data types like timestamps and IDs
Testing multiple invalid scenarios for each validation layer
gotchas_discovered: Missing required fields in nested objects
Tool messages require specific additional validation
Metric values have strict range constraints

test_scenarios_covered: Session to Conversation to Message validation

recommendations: Maintain comprehensive test coverage for complex nested validation
Continue using granular error reporting with specific field and message details
Consider extracting common validation logic to reduce repetition
Add more boundary condition tests for edge cases
